servicesPage.heroDescription: Professional wood restoration using our proven 3-step process.
servicesPage.processDescription: Every project follows our tried-and-true restoration method for consistent, beautiful results.

washing.title: Pressure Washing
washing.description: We start with a thorough deep clean using professional-grade pressure washing equipment. This removes years of dirt, grime, mold, and mildew, preparing the surface for sanding.

sanding.title: Sanding
sanding.description: Once dry, we carefully sand the entire surface to create the perfect canvas for staining. Sanding smooths rough spots, opens the wood grain, and ensures optimal stain absorption.
details: Prepares the wood texture for staining
Opens wood pores for better absorption

staining.title: Staining
staining.description: The final step is applying premium-quality stain that penetrates deep into the wood. Our stains protect against UV damage, moisture, and wear while bringing out the natural beauty of your wood.

stainSelector.subtitle: Explore the stain options available for your deck's condition.

categories.semiTransparentDescription: Enhances the natural grain of the wood while adding color and UV protection. Ideal for new or lightly worn decks.
categories.solidDescription: Provides full coverage with rich, uniform color while protecting the wood. Great for older or heavily weathered surfaces.

brands.lignaDescription: A high-performance hybrid stain offering superior penetration and long-lasting protection with a natural finish.
brands.steinaDescription: Premium semi-transparent stain with rich pigments for a natural, elegant finish that highlights wood grain.
